title: Live coding gencaster
description: On 2023-05-06 Toplap Düsseldorf organized a satellite event of the ICLC 2023, where artists from Düsseldorf were asked to contribute to a live coding concert.

teaser_img.alt: Dennis Scheiba holding a collaborative concert with gencaster

children.value: On 2023-05-06 Toplap Düsseldorf organized a satellite event of the ICLC 2023, where artists from Düsseldorf were asked to contribute to a live coding concert.
Dennis Scheiba, who is also a core developer of

, live coded Gencaster and the only way to listen to the performance was to access the website through a smartphone to obtain a stream.
Therefore each audience member became a loudspeaker which could move and also could adjust the volume of the speaker, creating a special kind of spatiality within the concert hall.
The sounds played through each of the smartphones were coded in real time on the laptop, and ranged from droning sine waves to the sound of a typewriter over to birds.

title: Ambiente Sonoro I - Paul Müller Reyes
description: At the Kunst Uni Graz, Paul Müller Reyes used gencaster to distribute his composition « Ambiente Sonoro I » with additional effects to the mobile phones of the audience on place and online.

teaser_img.alt: Title of ambiente sonoro with a background texture

children.value: At the Kunst Uni Graz, Paul Müller Reyes used gencaster to distribute his composition « Ambiente Sonoro I » with additional effects to the mobile phones of the audience on place and online.
Gencaster recieved the output of the mixer, added additional processing and then sent it to the listeners.

props.title: YouTube video player
props.allow: accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share
